summary: This document appears to be a financial statement for the MAX Foundation from UBS, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and investment objectives as of January 2018. It includes information about cash balances, dividends, and interest income, as well as contact information for the financial advisor Scott Stack. The document highlights the account's performance and provides insights into the foundation's financial management. This document appears to be a financial statement for the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account activity, balances, and important information regarding the account management and services provided by UBS Financial Services. It includes transaction details, account growth sources, and contact information for financial advisors. This document contains a financial statement for the MAX FOUNDATION account held at UBS Bank for February 2018. It details the account balance, cash and money balances, investment objectives, and advisor information. The document highlights the financial activities and performance of the account during the specified period. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and investment performance for March 2018. It includes information about cash balances, dividends, and interest income, as well as contact information for the financial advisor. This document contains financial information related to the MAX FOUNDATION, including account details, investment objectives, and advisor information. It outlines the account's cash balances and investment strategies as of March 2018. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account activity for March and April 2018. It includes information about deposits, account balances, and financial advisor details, indicating the management of funds associated with the foundation. This document contains details of the UBS Business Services Account for the Max Foundation, including investment objectives, account balances, and recent account activity. It highlights the financial advisor associated with the account and provides a summary of cash and money balances. This document contains financial statements related to an account held by the Max Foundation, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and contact information for financial advisors. It includes information about the account's performance over time and important notices regarding the management of the account. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION's business services account with UBS Bank USA for May and June 2018. It details account balances, income from dividends and interest, and provides information about the financial advisor managing the account. This document contains financial account information related to the MAX Foundation, detailing account balances, investment objectives, and advisor information. It highlights the financial activities and status of the account as of June 2018. This document contains financial statements related to the Max Foundation, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and investment performance. It includes information about the financial advisor and provides insights into the management of the foundation's assets. This document appears to be a financial statement for a business services account associated with the 'MAX FOUNDATION'. It includes details about account balances, investment objectives, and advisor information. The document highlights the account's cash and money balances as well as the advisor's contact information. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account activities and balances for July and August 2018. It includes information about deposits, account values, and financial advisory services provided by Scott Stack and Manlyle Casriel. This document contains a financial statement for the MAX Foundation's UBS Business Services Account for August 2018. It details account balances, dividend and interest income, and investment objectives, along with contact information for the financial advisor. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account activity for August and September 2018. It includes information about deposits, account balances, and financial advisor contact details, highlighting the management of funds associated with the foundation. This document contains financial statements for accounts associated with the MAX FOUNDATION, detailing account balances, financial advisors, and account activities for September and October 2018. It highlights the investment objectives, risk profiles, and account instructions, as well as the value of the accounts over time. This document contains financial statements for accounts associated with the MAX FOUNDATION and an individual named Aron. It details account balances, asset allocations, and investment objectives as of October 31, 2018. The financial advisor Scott Stack Manlyle Casriel is mentioned multiple times in relation to these accounts. This document appears to be a financial statement for the MAX Foundation from UBS Financial Services, detailing account activity, balances, and investment returns. It includes information about deposits, account values, and financial advice, indicating the management of funds associated with the foundation. This document is a financial statement for accounts associated with the MAX FOUNDATION and an individual named Aron. It details account balances, investment objectives, and advisor information, highlighting the financial activities and asset allocations as of November 30, 2018. This document contains financial statements related to the Max Foundation, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and investment returns as of December 2018. It includes contact information for financial advisors and warnings about fraud protection. This document contains financial statements for the MAX FOUNDATION's UBS Business Services Account for December 2018. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives, highlighting the financial activities and performance of the foundation during that period. This document appears to be a financial statement from UBS Bank USA detailing account activity for the MAX Foundation in December 2018. It includes information about account balances, withdrawals, and important notices regarding the account's management and protections.
